mcq_question: What most likely happened in the [3-7s] interval according to the video?

mcq_options.A: When he tries to adjust the microphone, the silver stand abruptly snaps in half like brittle glass, emitting a high-pitched shattering sound that echoes through the room and makes him pull his hands away.
mcq_options.B: As he grips the neck of the microphone, the silver metal softens into scaly skin and the head of the mic transforms into a wide-open human mouth that lets out a piercing, supernatural scream directly at him.

As he touches the neck of the microphone, the silver metal transforms into scaly skin, and the head of the microphone morphs into a wide-open human mouth that emits a piercing scream directly at him. This sequence of events matches option B exactly, making it the correct answer. The other options describe scenarios that do not occur in the video, such as the microphone snapping, igniting, or producing audio feedback.
